title: cars04
description:
Description
A data frame with 428 rows and 19 columns. This is a record of characteristics on all of the new models of cars for sale in the US in the year 2004.
reference:
library(ggplot2)

# Highway gas mileage
ggplot(cars04, aes(x = hwy_mpg)) +
  geom_histogram(
    bins = 15, color = "white",
    fill = openintro::IMSCOL["green", "full"]
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Highway gas milage for cars from 2004",
    x = "Gas Mileage (miles per gallon)",
    y = "Number of cars"
  )

parameters.length: Total length of the vehicle, measured in inches.
parameters.minivan: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is a minivan.
parameters.width: Total width of the vehicle, measured in inches.
parameters.rear_wheel: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is rear-wheel drive.
parameters.all_wheel: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is all-wheel drive.
parameters.suv: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is an suv.
parameters.wheel_base: Distance between the center of the front wheels and the center of the rear wheels, measured in inches.
parameters.horsepwr: Amount of horsepower produced by the engine.
parameters.weight: Total weight of the vehicle, measured in pounds.
parameters.hwy_mpg: Gas mileage for highway driving, measured in miles per gallon.
parameters.wagon: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is a wagon.
parameters.dealer_cost: Amount of money the dealer paid for the vehicle.
parameters.city_mpg: Gas mileage for city driving, measured in miles per gallon.
parameters.name: The name of the vehicle including manufacturer and model.
parameters.pickup: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is a pickup.
parameters.eng_size: Displacement of the engine - the total volume of all the cylinders, measured in liters.
parameters.sports_car: Logical variable indicating if the vehicle is a sports car.
parameters.msrp: Manufacturer suggested retail price of the vehicle.
parameters.ncyl: Number of cylinders in the engine.

format: A data frame with 428 observations on the following 19 variables.
